column2: ransacked]] and plundered the halls, retaking the [[Nauglamír]]. The victorious Dwarves marched along the banks of the Ascar with their spoils.  Suddenly, [[Beren]], [[Dior]] his son, and a host of [[Green-elves
column3: Laiquendi]] attacked the Dwarves.  After the [[Battle of Sarn Athrad]] Beren reclaimed the Nauglamír, but had the rest of the treasure of Doriath cast into the Ascar.  From that time forth the river was renamed [[Rathlóriel]] ("Goldenbed").<ref>{{S
